data.title: Barrick (GOLD) Sells Shares in Shandong Gold for $210 Million
data.text: Barrick (GOLD) currently owns 10,250,000 shares of Shandong Gold, which represents 2.05% interest.

data.title: Is Barrick Gold Too Expensive At $24?
data.text: Barrick Gold’s stock has rallied 42% since late March (vs. about 36% for the S&P 500) to its current level of $24.
